transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello ha sir, Parvez bol raha India Mart se, kal aap se baat ho rahi thi na, wo se leke 2 baje tak ke liye bola tha phone karne ke liye, ab kya time ho raha hai?
Executive: Ab to 3:30 ho raha hai sir.
Customer: To guruji main office me 3:30 baje baitha rehta hu.
Executive: System pe. Accha.
Customer: Actually me aapne sir 5 baje tak bola tha, main bhul lag raha hai confusion ho gaya.
Executive: Nahi.
Customer: Aapne bola tha office me 5:30 baje tak office band ho jata hai, main to waha pe ek aadha ghante, do ghante baithta hu bas.
Customer: Raat ko aap do ghante hi baithte hai.
Executive: Ha hai na. Dekhiye main jaldi jab aapka concern hai na, jo.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Wo lead ka hai, jo ki kab aa rahi hai, simple yahi hai, hai na?
Customer: Ha bilkul aur bilkul aur mere paas bhi orthosnil powder ki leads jo aa rahi hai, pehle ke mukable 30-40% kam aa rahi hai. To mera ek yahi suggestion tha.
Customer: Ki agar hum first hum particular keyword jo hai na, usko agar hum area wise, area wise dekhna promote kar de, to bahut effective business hum gain kar sakte hai. Nahi hua to kya dikkat hogi?
Executive: Ji? Aur nahi hua to fir kya dikkat hogi?
Customer: Dekhiye nahi hogi hogi uske liye to ab kuch pehle aap online aake jab khud check karenge, aapne check kiya bhi hai aur aap pehle bhi chalate the 20 cities. To humne aapko bola tha ki aane wale aane wale time me ye dikkat karega. Nahi aisa nahi hai sir, aisa to dikkat karega to plan nahi lete hum. Agar dikkat karta to plan nahi lete hum. Aapne aapko jo rate karoge aap, hum chahenge aur wahi me jayenge. Wahi wo to decision aapka hai hi. Hai? Wo to bilkul aapka decision hai, bilkul aap uske liye free hai, hum aapko ki aap kahi bhi ja sakte hai. Lekin hamara jo aapka jo concern hai, wo main aapko bata raha hu ki jaahir si baat hai ab aap leader service chala rahe the, as a market me leader train kar rahe the, buyer ko bhi baat hai medical leader train kar rahe hai, 20 20 district 20 city me promotion tha. Tabhi humne aapko bola tha ki aane wale 5, 7, 8, 9 mahine me tampering karega ye promotion aur aaj wahi ho raha hai. To meri jo company band hone wali hai?
Customer: Ji? Company band hone wali hai?
Executive: Kaun si company band hone wali hai? IndiaMART? Sir 20-20 lakh de rahe hai aap hi ki industry me, aap aisa bol rahe hai aap. Yaar aap jis tarike se aap baat kar rahe ho us hisab se aap yahi keh rahe ho ki dheere dheere company decrease kar rahi hai. Aap investment se ghabra rahe hai aap is tarike se baat kar rahe hai. Investment se kaha ghabra rahe hai, ab aap dheere dheere keh rahe hai company decrease kar rahi hai, is keyword pe lead nahi aa rahi hai. Aap kya karoge isko lakh rupay me badal doge yaar, same response maroge to kaha se laake dunga aap batao. Same kaha se hoga? Same ko kya kaun laake same response hoga? Bato aap kya keh rahe hai, matlab kya kehna cha rahe hai bataiye aapne. Maine yahi kaha ki isme na to leads aa rahi hai na buyer leads aa rahi hai. Sir jitni aa rahi hai sufficiently hum provide kar pa rahe hai, agar aapko growth chahiye to aapko apne aap ko promote karna padega us level pe, warna nahi. Dekho aap industry wise jaake dekhoge to isi ortho powder me aap khud dekho kis level pe log apne aap ko promote kar rahe hai. Jaahir si baat hai buyer un tak pehle pahunchega, aap tak kyu aayega? Simple sa logic hai na sir. To bhai ye logic to pehle batao na, aap keh rahe hai aapke paas buyer baad me aayega, pehle kisi aur ke paas jayega, usse bachega tab aapke paas aayega. Sir aisa to nahi hai ki aapko bataya nahi gaya hai, aapne khud hi download. Nahi main keh raha hu agar bataya jayega to aadmi kyu lega? Aapne apni service ko khud close kiya hai, aapne apne promotion ko khud giraya hai. Aapne hi to leader service ko gira ke basic me kar diya, jab aapne leader ka renewal nahi kiya, tabhi ye baat batai gayi thi ki sir dekho aane wale time me. Ye aapke paas written me kahi hai? Sir hum hi log se discussion hua tha, accha aapka leader chal raha tha ye pata hai na aapko? Aapki jab jab chal raha tha pehle to pehle se leader jaise jaise kaam kam hua waise waise isko change kar diya. Agar leading me itne paise dene ke baad bhi kaam nahi aayega to kaun zimmedar hoga, tum to saaf keh doge ki hoga nahi ji, leads nahi aa rahi to hum kaha se denge? Sir kaam to abhi aap keh rahe hai na ki do mahine se lead less ho raha hai, baat to yaha pe aapke yaha tak gayi hai ki do teen mahine se jo kam lead aa rahi hai uske liye aap call kar rahe hai baar baar, to isko promotion ko badhao na apne ko jo aap promotion karte ho jo inquiry generate karte ho. Aaj ki tarikh me. Apna promotion badhaiye aap. Hamara promotion already bada hua hai, logo ka jo area. Nahi bada hua na, agar bada hua hota to usse kaam nahi aata. Sir aapko samajhna padega area wise log apne aap ko promote kar rahe hai, naye log bhi aake apne aap ko bahut bahut promote promote kar rahe hai. Matlab purane log bekar hai, aapka kehne ka matlab ye hai? Main maine aapko bekar nahi kaha. Maine ye kaha hai ki jo log naye bhi aa rahe hai, wo bhi samajh gaye hai is baat ko lekar ki dekho industry wise industry wise na cheeze badalti badalti rehti hai. Hamari jo industry hai na, isme aap samadhan nahi kar rahe, behas kar rahe hai. Behas bhai kar hi nahi raha, main bilkul aapko. Aap behas kar rahe hai samadhan nahi kar rahe. Behas main kar hi nahi raha, koi aisi baat nahi jo behas ke layak hai, aap bataiye. Behas ke layak hi to baat ho rahi hai, aapne kuch maine bola ki main agar leads bhejta hu fake lead aa rahi hai aur ye sab aa rahi hai us pe to aapne koi karwai kari nahi hai, ab mujhe jabardasti ki behas kar rahe hai. Main wahi keh raha hu ki less jo leads ka jo aap provision bata rahe hai na, mere paas jo leads aa rahi hai total, usme jo total leads aapko ja rahi hai, wo total leads dekho main leads jab bol raha hu to main inquiry bhi bol raha hu, call bhi bol raha hu aur buyer bhi bol raha hu, teeno cheez bol raha hu, theek hai? To teeno ka jo teeno ka jo agar main average nikalta hu na, to mere paas jitni aayi hai, usme jitni aapke paas gayi hai, total wo lagbhag 10 20% ke aas paas abhi tak aapne receive kiya hai. Jo major portion ka hai, accha khasa receiving hua hai aapko. Kuch lead aisi hui hogi jo aap online nahi honge, aap consume nahi kar paaye honge, wo sold out ho gayi hongi. Ya aapke portal pe aap us time available nahi rahe honge, main samajhta hu kyuki aap busy person hai. Mera aisa koi concern nahi hai ki aapko us category ke liye us promote main bas suggest kar raha hu kyuki aapne wo jiya hai life, jab aap leading supplier the, to aapko pata hai, hai na? To main yahi suggest kar raha hu ke agar us particular keyword ko hame promote karna hai, to hum kya kar sakte hai? Agar aapki ichcha hai to, warna jitna abhi hai, us level pe sir itna hi abhi sufficiently milega. Rahi baat jo lead aap bata rahe hai ki koi lead aisa bol deta hai ki hum nahi chahte.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving less leads than before.

- Customer believes company is decreasing slowly.

- Customer claims fake leads are being sent.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of self-promotion.

- Executive stated customer received 10-20% leads.

- Executive clarified the leads include inquiry, call, buyer.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- leads, promotion, industry, service, keyword

seller_categories.mcat_name: Gopal Herbal Joint Pain Relief Powder
